item.description:
Hi Everyone...

For all you SoutEnders and fans (not to be confused with EastEnders a BBC TV series. Susan, I know... I know... I need to get out of the South End :)

BUT... since I received such positive feedback about our early dinner and cocktails at the Gaslight, how about a return visit on Sunday April 5th? To be fair, there were quite a few people who couldn't make it the first time. Besides... it's a great place and there's plenty.... of free parking. lol

Cocktail @ 5:00PM and dinner @ 6:00 or 6:30PM at:

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin
560 Harrison Ave
Boston, MA 02118
(617) 422-0224
Price: Reasonable
www.gaslight560.com (check them out on the web)

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin, (literally brasserie on the corner) is The Aquitaine Groupâ€™s classic neighborhood Parisian brasserie.

I hope to see you at Gaslight!

Cheers,
Michael

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Return to the Gaslight? French cuisine in the South End
